problem.p: A woman weighing 6.0 \(\times\) 102 N is riding an elevator from the 1st floor to the 6th floor. As the elevator approaches the 6th floor, it decreases its upward speed from 8.0 m/s to 2.0 m/s in 3.0 s. What is the average force exerted by the elevator floor on this woman during this 3.0 s interval?
